alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 5:10AM CDT until September 24 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... East central Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 510 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Winthrop to near Foreman to 7 miles northwest of De Kalb, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Horatio, Foreman, De Kalb, Winthrop, Arkinda, Almont, Cerrogordo, Beaverdams, Goodlake, Central, Shinewell, Wallace, Tom, Arden, and West Otis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
